{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.21719v1", "title": "The Principle of Redundant Reflection", "summary": "The fact that redundant information does not change a rational belief after
Bayesian updating implies uniqueness of Bayes rule. In fact, any updating rule
is uniquely specified by this principle. This is true for the classical
